column4: Hello, i have 9.04 which was working just fine for the first few days. I shut down the system for a week or more, now when i started it back up and try and login it crashes after login and relaunches the login screen, over and over and over again. What can i do to try and resolve this?
Guest411177 I've seen a usb method for this
How can you get into safe mode?
or a terminal if you can't login with gnome?
use another console?? try CTRL + ALT F1
